Types

Color = object
  r*, g*, b*: float32
Color object 
HdrImage = object
  width*, height*: int
  pixels*: seq[Color]
HDR Image object: width, height are int and pixels is a seq of color

Consts

BLACK = (r: 0.0, g: 0.0, b: 0.0)
WHITE = (r: 1.0, g: 1.0, b: 1.0)
